comment: Let me be clear, we must no-platform fascists, we must shut the door in the face of hate, division and intolerance. We must stamp it out and fight against it around the world - and we must fight the dark possibility of a dangerous racist in Boris Johnson walking into Number right here in the UK. and so democratic! he dont like any thing you say no debate no counter argument, HE decides if you can speak! no-platforming people because of his intolerance of them is so inclusive and will bring people together! this is the nonsense he constantly spouts this shit. Read more at
